name: Hall of Doors
description:
Explore the Hall of Doors to find your way out! Each door leads to the maze, but be warned - the gravity switches based on the door you enter. Find all the items scattered throughout the maze to create the floor blocks needed to reach the final end door and escape! Your character is always running so pay attention that you don't fall!

Use WASD/Arrow keys to fly up or move left and right. When on a door, hit the SPACE bar to enter the door. Features two different difficulty modes!

Created for the 8 Bits to Infinity jam in January 2023 with the theme "Running" and the optional theme of "Gravity." All art/audio assets obtained via third party purchases and credited in the game.
